name: Dependency Graph
title: Dependency Graph
description: Graph structure mapping dependencies between knowledge files, skills, and agents in the Factory ecosystem

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Explicit edges enable verification of artifact dependencies
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Graph supports discovery of artifacts for user goals
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Node and edge structure makes dependencies traceable
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Dependency validation prevents circular or broken references
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified graph structure across knowledge, skills, and agents

dependency_traversal.description: Navigate dependency graph to understand artifact relationships and impact of changes
dependency_traversal.usage: Query nodes.{artifact_id} to find dependencies, edges to find relationships, and metadata for artifact details
dependency_traversal.use_when: Query nodes.{artifact_id} to find dependencies, edges to find relationships, and metadata for artifact details
dependency_traversal.code_example:
def get_dependents(graph, artifact_id):
    return [e["from"] for e in graph["edges"] if e["to"] == artifact_id]
best_practices: Document the pattern usage and rationale in code comments
Validate implementation against domain requirements before deployment

impact_analysis.description: Analyze which artifacts are affected when modifying a knowledge file, skill, or agent
impact_analysis.usage: Query edges with 'to' matching artifact_id to find all artifacts that depend on the modified artifact
impact_analysis.use_when: Query edges with 'to' matching artifact_id to find all artifacts that depend on the modified artifact
impact_analysis.code_example:
# Implement impact_analysis per dependency-graph patterns
# See description and related documentation
best_practices: Document the pattern usage and rationale in code comments
Validate implementation against domain requirements before deployment

circular_dependency_detection.description: Detect circular dependencies that break resolution order and cause validation failures
circular_dependency_detection.usage: Traverse edges to find cycles. Use validation_commands.check_deps to detect circular references automatically
circular_dependency_detection.use_when: Traverse edges to find cycles. Use validation_commands.check_deps to detect circular references automatically
circular_dependency_detection.code_example:
# Implement circular_dependency_detection per dependency-graph patterns
# See description and related documentation
best_practices: Document the pattern usage and rationale in code comments
Validate implementation against domain requirements before deployment

artifact_discovery.description: Discover related artifacts by querying nodes by type (knowledge, skill, agent, blueprint) and metadata tags
artifact_discovery.usage: Filter nodes by type and metadata.tags to find artifacts related to specific domains or technologies
artifact_discovery.use_when: Filter nodes by type and metadata.tags to find artifacts related to specific domains or technologies
artifact_discovery.code_example:
# Implement artifact_discovery per dependency-graph patterns
# See description and related documentation
best_practices: Document the pattern usage and rationale in code comments
Validate implementation against domain requirements before deployment
Validate dependency graph for circular dependencies before committing changes to prevent resolution failures
Query dependency graph to understand impact before modifying knowledge files, skills, or agents
Keep dependency graph synchronized with actual artifact relationships - update edges when creating new dependencies
Use metadata.tags to discover related artifacts across different artifact types (knowledge, skills, agents)
Reference dependency graph when planning refactoring to identify all affected artifacts upfront
Run validation_commands.check_deps regularly to catch broken references and circular dependencies early
Document dependency rationale in edge metadata when creating new relationships to help future maintainers
Use statistics to understand Factory complexity and identify opportunities for simplification or consolidation

anti_patterns.name: Circular Dependency Chains
anti_patterns.problem: Creating dependency cycles between knowledge files, agents, or skills breaks resolution order and causes validation failures
anti_patterns.solution: Validate dependency graph for cycles before committing. Use dependency-graph.json validation commands to detect automatically

anti_patterns.name: Orphaned Artifacts
anti_patterns.problem: Creating artifacts without adding them to dependency graph makes discovery difficult and breaks impact analysis
anti_patterns.solution: Always add new artifacts to dependency-graph.json nodes. Create edges for all dependencies and references

anti_patterns.name: Stale Dependency Edges
anti_patterns.problem: Not updating edges when removing dependencies leaves broken references in dependency graph
anti_patterns.solution: Remove edges when deleting dependencies. Run validation commands to detect stale references automatically

anti_patterns.name: Missing Metadata
anti_patterns.problem: Creating nodes without metadata (tags, category, description) reduces discoverability and filtering capabilities
anti_patterns.solution: Always include complete metadata when adding nodes. Use consistent tags and categories for better filtering

anti_patterns.name: Graph Desynchronization
anti_patterns.problem: Dependency graph not matching actual artifact relationships causes incorrect impact analysis and broken validations
anti_patterns.solution: Keep dependency graph synchronized with artifact changes. Use automated validation to detect drift
